participant_1.name: Evelyn Carter
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, with a love for literature and travel.
participant_1.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry. i am a huge star wars fan.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Open-minded and relaxed, enjoys staying active and has a strong bond with pets.
participant_2.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. my father was a door to door salesman. i also have a dog walking business.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i'm a librarian.
i really like to travel.
i have visited spain a times.
i think i will retire in a few years.
i am 60years old.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below

Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner: 

1️⃣:
i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine.
i go to the gym regularly.
i have short hair.
two dogs live with me.
2️⃣:
i don't have many friends.
i hate school.
i am a 12 year old girl.
i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.
Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
